title: Roll in the Hole v1.0.6 [PD]
description:
Meet PoPo, the chubby panda who just can't get enough ice cream. Imagine his surprise when he wakes after a summer snooze to find the cheeky gorilla Uggi has stolen his icy treats! Roll the rotund little bear around each level and chase Uggi to the hole. 

You'll have to choose the best route if you want to collect all your missing ice creams though.

Roll in the Hole may look super cute but thereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s more than enough challenge and outside-the-box puzzles here to keep players of all ages entertained in this super-addictive, family-fun adventure!

**Runs beautifully on tablets**

- AMAZING LEVEL DESIGN - 72 incredibly varied and fun-to-play levels where grass, sand and ice will affect PoPo's roll. Master your environment to stay in the game!
- PERFECT CONTROLS- Playing as PoPo is a breeze, intuitive control of spin and direction means that anyone can have a go, you'll be a natural after just a few seconds. Choose to press either side of the screen or tilt the device.
- TO BOLDLY GO WHERE NO PANDA HAS GONE BEFOREÃ¢â‚¬Â¨- Follow the hilarious story that takes PoPo from the jungle into outer space!
- CHARISMATIC CHARACTERSÃ¢â‚¬Â¨- Control PoPo on his adventure and meet cute characters Uggi the Gorilla and Zappi the Alien.
- HILARIOUS SOUNDSÃ¢â‚¬Â¨- Cute and funny sound effects will put a smile on your face as you bounce and roll your way through the weird and wonderful worlds.

** We have noticed that customers running OS 3.2 on their Motorola Xoom have had problems running this game on their device. We are investigating the issue, but advise updating your Xoom to OS 3.2.1 as soon as possible, which will fix this issue. **

What's New:

* Better compatibility with new devices
